Question: Graphene Square Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Graphene Square Inc.

Cordless Transparent Graphene Cooker
 - Utilizes energy-efficient mid-IR radiation
 - Rechargeable and environmentally friendly
 - Aims to replace traditional coil heaters with 30% less power consumption

Graphene Radiator
 - Generates heat efficiently using graphene
 - Requires less space and consumes 30% less energy

Graphene Kitchen Styler
 - Heats up to nearly 570 degrees Fahrenheit in two minutes
 - Features a rechargeable battery pack for outdoor use
 - Scheduled for release in 2023

Other Offerings
 - CVD Graphene Film: High-quality, efficient graphene films
 - Graphene On Demand: Custom CVD graphene films on substrates
 - CVD Equipment: For synthesis of graphene and other 2D materials
 - Provides graphene oxides (GOs) and graphene quantum dots (GQDs)
 -
Summary_cn:
石墨烯方形公司。

无线透明石墨烯炊具
-采用节能中红外辐射
-可充电且环保
-旨在用比传统线圈加热器少30％的功耗替代传统线圈加热器

石墨烯散热器
-使用石墨烯高效产生热量
-占用较少空间且耗能少30％

石墨烯厨房造型器
-两分钟内加热达到近摄氏570度
-配备户外可用的可充电电池组
-计划于2023年发布

其他产品
-化学气相沉积法石墨烯薄膜：高质量、高效石墨烯薄膜
-按需提供石墨烯化学气相沉积法薄膜基板定制服务
-化学气相沉积设备：用于合成石墨烯和其他二维材料
-提供氧化石墨烯和石墨烯量子点
